name: Pong Royale
description:
This is the very first game I ever created. It is actually an assignment where we need to create a pong game and add our own mechanics in it, and as Battle Royale games were still very famous that time, I have added in some elements of Battle Royale into my game too! Now not only do players need to try their best to score a goal, they need to try their best to survive too! Hope you enjoy it, have fun!!!

(Click inside the window if the game is not responding at the very beginning)
